name: Ferzu (keep post images)
description: Make ferzu betterer! A few things that Ferzu should have, but doesn't and probably never will. You don't like images in your feed? I gotchu fam
additional_info: What this does now: * Keeps posts from leaving their boxes, for when people re-discover you can do that. * Hides the "reminder" that paying for ferzu gets you unlimited full size photo views. * Dark theme * More modern font choice * Colorful icons * Assorted cleanups What's left to do: * Fix top notification banner to be a window * What do you wanna have me do? Attributions: * Newspaper icons created by Freepik - Flaticon - Used for news feed * People icons created by Freepik - Flaticon - Used for people * Photo icons created by Freepik - Flaticon - Used for photos * Event icons created by Freepik - Flaticon - Used for events * Search icons created by Good Ware - Flaticon - Used for search * Message icons created by Freepik - Flaticon - Used for messages & show more comments * User interface icons created by Anggara - Flaticon - Used for notifications * Gear icons created by Freepik - Flaticon - Used for settings * English-language icons created by bearicons - Flaticon - Used for language selection * Exit icons created by Smashicons - Flaticon - Used for sign out * Loud speaker icons created by Freepik - Flaticon - Used for alerts/preferences * Question mark icons created by Freepik - Flaticon - Used for support * Ui icons created by Saepul Nahwan - Flaticon - Used for deleting DMs * Share post icons created by Pixel perfect - Flaticon - Used for post permalink * Thumbs up icons created by Smashicons - Flaticon - Used for post/comment like * Arrow icons created by Smashicons - Flaticon - Used for external links * Waiting icons created by Freepik - Flaticon - Used for wait/loading * Close icons created by Freepik - Flaticon - Used for closing tabs/windows * Sort icons created by Smashicons - Flaticon - Used for filtering * Facebook icons created by Freepik - Flaticon - Facebook icon * Twitter icons created by Freepik - Flaticon - Twitter icon * Colored-pencil icons created by Freepik - Flaticon - Blog icon * User icons created by iconixar - Flaticon - Used for edit profile * Block icons created by Those Icons - Flaticon - Used for blocked users * Check mark icons created by Octopocto - Flaticon - Used to unblock users * Alert icons created by Freepik - Flaticon - Used to report users * File upload icons created by Freepik - Flaticon - Used for uploading photos * Heart icons created by Freepik - Flaticon - Flirts
